sellerCard.oneLiner: AI, Cloud Expert: Scalable Solutions, AWS, ML, DevOps, Automation!
sellerCard.description:
Cloud & AI Expert | Developer | DevOps | Cloud Architect | Machine Learning | LLM


★ AWS (Amazon Web Services) 4X Certified
★ Building AI & ML Applications ranging from chatbots to agents to traditional machine learning models
★ 11 Years of Experience across AWS, Azure and Google Cloud Platform
★ Designing, Automation and Deploying web applications at scale
★ Experience with Fortune 500 organizations

description.content:
Please discuss the details before placing the order. 


Want to leverage AI to grow your business and overcome the competition?


Are you looking to develop a cutting-edge AI-powered app for your mobile or web platform? Look no further! I specialize in developing advanced AI applications using OpenAI, DALL-E, and Chat GPT or open source models.


Be rest assured you are in the right place!


With my expertise in AI and machine learning, I can create a custom AI-powered application that meets your unique needs and requirements. Whether you want a chatbot that can answer customer queries, a recommendation engine that suggests products or services, or an app that generates creative content, I can help you with it.


What do I offer? 


⭐️ Custom AI Agents

⭐️ Custom AI app development using OpenAI, DALL-E, and Chat GPT

⭐️ Training ChatGPT with your Data

⭐️ Integrate Bot Voice with Chat GPT app

⭐️ Building full-stack GPT applications

⭐️ Voice Chatbot with Agents

⭐️ Custom AI writing tool or long form or langchain

⭐️ Integration with your existing web or mobile platform

⭐️ Ongoing support and maintenance.


Contact me to begin discussing your AI app today!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What kind of AI-powered applications can you develop?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I specialize in creating a wide range of AI applications including chatbots, recommendation engines, content generators, and more, using advanced technologies like OpenAI, DALL-E, and Chat GPT. Each solution is tailored to meet unique business needs and integrate seamlessly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you customize ChatGPT for specific business needs?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I offer services to train ChatGPT with your proprietary data to create highly specialized and context-aware solutions. This can range from customer service bots to personalized content creation tools, ensuring your AI is aligned with your business objectives and audience.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the process for training the AI model with my data?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Training an AI model involves data collection, cleaning, and model training. I'll guide you through the process of preparing your data, then use it to train the AI model, ensuring it understands and responds accurately to your specific needs and context. Post-deployment, I'll fine-tune the model.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do we get started with developing a custom AI-powered app?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To begin, please contact me to discuss your vision and requirements. We'll explore the possibilities, outline a project plan, and ensure a clear understanding of the timeline, costs, and expected outcomes. Once confirmed, I'll start crafting your custom AI solution.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you ensure the AI application aligns with my business goals?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Before development, I conduct a thorough analysis of your business objectives and requirements. This ensures the AI solution, whether a chatbot, recommendation system, or content generator, is perfectly tailored to drive your business goals and deliver measurable results.

reviews_snippet.comment: Highly recommended! Achieved the solution I was struggling to figure out myself and had excellent communication. Will definitely use again!
It was an absolute pleasure to connect with Ujjwal. He has good knowledge of AWS hosting; and is very professional. Loved interacting with him

He was a very professional someone and very time conscious and also know what his doing.
I will recommend him anytime any day. His attitude and the level of professionalism was second to none.
His so patient and he can communicate very well. 
His level of english was so good at high standard.
